t: Afterglow Of Ragnarok by Bruce Dickinson: Amazon.co.uk: CDs & Vinyl
s: Great single in an unusual format. Great to have a Bruce solo single after quite a while. ... I am an Iron Maiden fan that is all you need to know. I have been onstage with Bruce Dickinson when i flew out to Sweden for Bruce Air 2006 and got to meet him to sign his book and to see him next year . That is all up the irons ... Looking forward to the album!! Bruce sounds great. Good heavy track. The vinyl ...

t: Amazon.com: Bruce Dickinson - All The Young Dudes - [7"]: CDs & Vinyl
s: It is another excellent single off Bruce Dickinson's Tattooed Millionaire, which has two covers Mott The Hoople's All The Young Dudes penned by David Bowie for them and AC/DC's Sin City. There is also Darkness Be My Friend, which is Bruce's own composition and, which is sandwiched by the two covers.

t: The Best of Bruce Dickinson: Amazon.co.uk: CDs & Vinyl
Amazon.com: Bruce Dickinson - Anthology : CDs & Vinyl
s: What can be said about Bruce Dickinson. He certainly needs no introduction. Back in the early nineties when he announced he was leaving Maiden I was crushed. But his music kept my hopes up and gave me something besides Maiden to listen to. It wasn't Maiden, but it was still fun and interesting.

t: Amazon.com: Tyranny of Souls[LP]: CDs & Vinyl
s: The first few track remind me of ... Bruce Dickinson on vocals. As other have stated Bruce sounds so incredible on this one, perhaps his best signing on any solo album. Devil on a Hog is another favorite of mine. Love the old-school raw rock n roll sound of that one. Beautiful! Believil does sound a bit like Dio, but that's a good thing in my book. The title cut is a great closer. This album has seriously grown on me, so I had to order the vinyl to go with ...
